typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		depid as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> empldata
source(output(
		depid as string,
		depname as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> Department
empldata, Department join(empldata@depid == Department@depid,
	joinType:'inner',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
